concept.title: Establishing an alternate exclude user name delimiter
concept.shortdesc: In rare cases, user names might conflict with the character (a comma) used to separate the list of user names that the CuramLoginModule excludes from authentication. In this case, an alternate character can be specified.

conbody.p: To specify a different character, add for example:curam.security.usernames.delimiter=|to AppServer.properties before you run the Ant configure target.
For a previously configured server, see the steps in Set up the System JAAS Login Module to set the exclude_usernames_delimiter property.
